meanings.definition: A type of bird with a distinctive crest and colorful plumage.
meanings.sent1: The hoopoos chirped melodiously in the trees.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a group of hoopoos flying gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The hoopoos decided to have a colorful feather fashion show.
meanings.sent4: Her hat resembled the crest of a hoopoos, standing out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The hoopoos' vibrant plumage brightened up the forest.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'hoopoo', referring to more than one of these birds.
meanings.sent1: We saw a flock of hoopoos perched on the branches.
meanings.sent2: The hoopoos nested together in the tall trees.
meanings.sent3: The hoopoos held a meeting to discuss their next migration.
meanings.sent4: The sky was filled with hoopoos, a colorful spectacle above.
meanings.sent5: The hoopoos' songs echoed through the valley, a chorus of nature.
